transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Junaid ji good morning. Aniket bol raha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Achcha Aniket ji good morning.
Executive: Haan, to aapne parso matlab parso video meet ki request dali thi raat mein 7:00 baje lagbhag mein.
Customer: 7:00 baje.
Executive: Hello. Haan matlab sham mein aapne parso video meet kyun dala tha na? Main office time 6:15 tak kisi mein 6:15 baje nikal gaya tha to uske baad phir abhi aaya office to dekha abhi.
Customer: To abhi aap free hai hum?
Executive: Haan. Par kal aap message kiya tha lead junior okay wait main call main meet request send jud kar raha.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ek minute call pe rahega.

Executive: Maine mail kiya hua hai aapko phir main whatsapp bhi kar deta hu.

Executive: Ek minute.

Executive: Maine whatsapp bhi kar diya hai.
Executive: Ji number se humari baat hoti hai whatsapp usi number pe du na?
Customer: Whatsapp working karu kya?
Executive: Haan whatsapp pe main bhej raha hu ek minute.

Executive: 7060 wali na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Maine bheja hua hai. Isko join kijiyega aap.

Customer: Ja se nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Mil gaya sir aapko?
Customer: Haan haan mil gaya.
Executive: Join kar lijiyega usko aap.

Customer: Ispe ispe jo option aa raha hai wohi aa raha hai ispe join with code isko karu kya?
Executive: Haan jo maine second wala link bheja hai na.
Customer: Haan haan link video call link pe click kiya haan ab kya aa raha hai?
Customer: Uspe aa raha hai new meeting and join with a code. Join join with a code new meeting pe nahi jo link pe click join with code ya join with IndiaMART hoga. Join with IndiaMART bhi likha hoga kahin pe.
Executive: Screenshot bhejiye mujhe whatsapp pe mobile se kar rahe hai desktop se kis se kar rahe hai aap?
Customer: Main mobile se kar raha hu main screen. Mobile se kar rahe hai na haan screenshot bhejiye mujhe aap.

Customer: Dekhiye ye aa raha hai likha.
Executive: Ek minute. Join with code pe click kariye kya aata hai?
Customer: Ek minute abhi karta hu.
Executive: Uska bhi screenshot bhejiye ga.

Customer: Ye sir ji click kar raha hu ispe dismiss ka option aa raha.
Executive: Achcha call dismiss likha hoga right call dismiss.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To call call cut kar do phir aap. Aap call cut kar do.
Customer: Okay. Aap call cut kar do aap join kar lijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to join video meet.



Resolution:

- Executive sent link on WhatsApp.

- Executive guided to join via link.

- Asked to share screenshot to identify issue.

- Asked to disconnect the call and join again.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, whatsapp, join, link
